name: LG Electronics
title: AX Center: From Digital to AI Transformation

classification.classificationRationale: The AX Center is a centralized entity (renamed from DX organization) with a mandate to drive AI transformation across all business units. This is the CoE pattern (Model 2): a central team providing AI governance, strategy, and capability to the rest of the organization. The renaming from DX to AX signals strategic priority shift but not structural change. Structural orientation: AX Center is a named, formally-structured entity with CEO-level commitment and a 30% productivity improvement mandate.

description:
LG Electronics rebranded its Digital Transformation organization as the 'AX Center' (AI Transformation Center), signaling a strategic shift from general digitization to AI-first operations. The company set a concrete goal of 30% productivity improvement across all business units through AI deployment.
- Renamed existing DX organization to AX Center to signal strategic priority shift
- Set measurable 30% productivity improvement target across all operations
- Deployed AI across customer service, manufacturing, and product development
- CEO publicly committed to AI transformation as company's primary strategic focus

observableMarkers.metrics: 30% productivity improvement target; company-wide AI transformation mandate

layers.label: WaveX AI Venture Studio Launch
layers.summary: LG Electronics' NovaWave Capital (under LG NOVA innovation center) launched WaveX AI venture studio in Arizona at CES 2026. Targets healthcare, energy, sports, media AI ventures. Collaboration with Arizona Commerce Authority. Added secondary Model 5 (Venture Builder). LG NOVA hubs in Silicon Valley and West Virginia complement the Arizona studio.

layers.label: Curation Review
layers.summary: RECLASSIFIED: Model 4 (Hub-and-Spoke) to Model 2 (Center of Excellence). The AX Center is a renamed DX organization—it is a centralized entity providing AI transformation capability to business units, which is the CoE pattern. Hub-and-Spoke implies distributed spokes with AI capabilities; here the data only shows a central unit with a mandate. Changed orientation from Contextual to Structural: the AX Center is a named, formally-structured entity with CEO commitment. Added habitat data.
